title: Civil liability for misstatements in prospectus.
content: 360. Section 43 shall extend to every prospectus offering for subscription shares in or debentures of a company incorporated or to be incorporated outside the Republic, whether the company has or has not established, or when formed will or will not establish, a place of business in the Republic, with the substitution, for references to section 40, of references to section 357. Interpretation of provisions as to prospectuses.
